K

KD_configuration - Class in eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib
This class represents the configuration object used by the KD Core

KD_configuration.ColumExtraction - Enum in eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib
Enum Type that setups the columns configuration in the input file.
KD_configuration.Group - Enum in eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib
Enum Type that setups the lemmatization approach of the tool (Experimental).
KD_configuration.Prefer_Specific_Concept - Enum in eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib
Enum Type that gives more relevance to specific(longer) key-phrases.
KD_configuration.Tagset - Enum in eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib
Enum Type that setups the tagset used in the preprocessed file.
KD_core - Class in eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib
Core Class of the tool.
KD_core(KD_core.Threads) - Constructor for class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_core
Creates an instance of the KD tool with t number of threads

Creates an instance of the KD tool with t number of threads , with lang Language and configuration KD_configuration
KD_core.Language - Enum in eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib
Enum Type that setups the language of the input files.
KD_core.Threads - Enum in eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib
Enum Type that setups the number of threads used by the tool.

L

languagePackPath - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
Specify the custom language folder path.
lemma_position - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
specify the lemma column position (in case of CUSTOM ColumExtraction option)
local_frequency_threshold - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
The frequency threshold for multiword recognition at document level: a multiword can (but is not necessarily) recognized in a text, if it occurs in a reference corpus at least the number of times specified by this option.

M

Main - Class in eu.fbk.dh.kd
eu.fbk.dh.kd.Main runnable class Please refer to the help for more information about the parameters
Main() - Constructor for class eu.fbk.dh.kd.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.Main
main.
max_keyword_length - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
Max keyword length allowed during the extraction process.

N

no_abstract - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
Do not use any boost for any abstract concept suffix
no_idf - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
Do not use any kind of IDF information (even if the domain corpus, or docset corpus options are specified]
no_rerank - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
Disables the re-ranking of key-concepts based on their first occurrence in the text.
no_syn - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
KD does not tries to recognize any synonymous phrases specified in the synonyms list.
normalized_score - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_keyconcept
double values representing the normalized score from 0 to 1 gives by the tool to the current key-phrase
numberOfConcepts - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
Number of keyconcepts to be retrieved by the KD Core By default is set to -1 that implies the extraction of all keyconcepts present in the ranked list.

O

only_multiword - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
If you use this option, the tool extracts only the multi-word (multi-token) concept.

P

pos_position - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
specify the pos column position (in case of CUSTOM ColumExtraction option)
prefer_specific_concept - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
This option tunes the re-ranking mechanism that tends to raise the position of more specific (longer) key-concepts.

R

requirementsSatisfied() - Method in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.annotator.DigiKDAnnotator
requires() - Method in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.annotator.DigiKDAnnotator
rerank_by_position - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
If you use this option, KD will re-rank key-concepts by raising concepts that appear early in the text.
run_the_updater(KD_core.Language, String) - Static method in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_loader
This method regenerate the serialized object from the configuration files

skip_keyword_with_not_allowed_words - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
If you use this option, the tool discards the key-concepts with inside an item contained in the keyconcept-no file.
skip_keyword_with_proper_noun - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
If you use this option, the tool discards the key-concepts with inside proper noun identified by the part of speech.
skip_proper_noun - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
If you use this option, the tool discards the proper noun identified by the part of speech.
skipFrequencyAbsorption - Variable in class eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration
Disables or enables the frequency re-computation on shorter/longer key-phrases.
